p: Energy decomposition is presented in Figure 4. In these graphics, the most important ligand/residue interactions for each interface can be easily observed. Ligands with the strongest ligand/dimer interactions can be visualized in Figures S6-13. A possible strategy to analyze these results in IF-1 and IF-2 is to focus on those residues that are known to interact with RNA (Kang et al., 2020).
